alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 9:33AM EDT until September 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. .Due to heavy rain expected over the next couple of days, the Alafia River at Lithia is expected to reach Flood Stage. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alafia River at Lithia . * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River Drive and Squirrel Run Way downstream of County Road 640 are completely covered by water. One home begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon to a crest of 13.7 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.7 feet on 08/14/1948. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Alafia River Lithia 13.0 5.5 Tue 9 am 6.3 12.6 13.7 12.7 11.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EDT.
